Items.Title: Oversight - The Department of Investigation’s Office of the Inspector General for the NYPD.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Department of Investigation’s Office of the Inspector General for the NYPD.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the replacement of the individual responsible for implementing certain duties of the commissioner of investigation relating to the police department and reporting on investigations relating to the police department
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Replacement of the individual responsible for implementing certain duties of the commissioner of investigation relating to the police department and reporting on investigations relating to the police department.

Items.Title: Resolution directing the Department of Investigation to conduct an investigation to ascertain the knowledge possessed by mayoral administrations on environmental toxins produced by the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks on the World Trade Center and to submit a report to the Council thereon.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOI to conduct an investigation to ascertain the knowledge possessed by mayoral administrations on environmental toxins produced by the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks on the World Trade Center and to submit a report to the Council thereon.

Items.Title: Oversight - The Department of Investigation’s Office of the Inspector General for the NYPD.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Department of Investigation’s Office of the Inspector General for the NYPD.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the replacement of the individual responsible for implementing certain duties of the commissioner of investigation relating to the police department and reporting on investigations relating to the police department
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
